examples.text: # RetroGaming PUZZLE MASTER - DS Game - Nintendo -
out some chip tune with pulseboy for a retrogaming streaming show's opening ; )

relations.target: gaming: the act of playing for stakes in the hope of winning (including the payment of a price for a chance to win a prize); 'his gambling cost him a fortune'; 'there was heavy play at the blackjack table' <i37660>
video game: a game played against a computer <i37827>

senses.definition: The hobby of playing or collecting older video games and computer games. [Wiktionary]
